The '[[Samsung]] Focus' (also known as the 'SGH-i917' and 'Samsung Cetus') is a
slate smartphone which runs Microsoft's Windows Phone operating system. It
features a 1 GHz QualcommÂ® Snapdragonâ¢ processor, a 4.0-inch Super AMOLED
screen, and 8GB of internal storage (expandable to 40GB with a 32GB microSD
card). As of November 2011, it is the 4th lightest and thinnest Windows Phone,
behind the Samsung Focus Flash, HTC Titan and the Samsung Focus S, a more high-
end version of the original Focus.
